comment: From a point ` C ` outside of a line ` A ` , there exists a unique point ` x ` on ` A ` such that ` ( C L x ) ` is perpendicular to ` A ` . That point is called the foot from ` C ` on ` A ` . Theorem 8.18 of [Schwabhauser] p. 60. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2019.)
